page.title: 03Barnt Green First school
page.content: The village school is called St.Andrew's C.E. First School, Barnt Green. It is a{Voluntaryaided school with pupils from five to nine years of age. There are 153 children in school at the time of this survey and they are divided into five classes according to their age.There are 6 teachers including the Headteacher, Mr. P.J. Wright, two part time secretaries, four dinner superintendants and two part-time cleaners. The main part of the children's education is number and language work but music, science, history, geography, art, religious education and P.E. are all taught. There are six School Governors elected from the L.E.A., the Parochial Church council, the Diocesan representative and the Parish Council.
